location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sherauz [Shiraz] to Captain M E Bagnold, Acting Paymaster to the British Troops at Bassidore

mods.abstract: The letter regards a request for a further advance of funds to meet the needs of the Pay Department to British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū]. The letter notes that the Resident hopes that a consignment of cash being delivered by the HC Cruizer Mercurywill meet their short terms needs.
